title: Trinity Force is a luxury item on Jax.
body:
So why the hell does every single Jax rush it, even when they are 0/11/0 and 15 cs at 25 mins?

If you really must have it, why not counter build against your lane opponent, play safe, farm creeps, port bot and get objectives, feed a whole lot less, and get it as a second or third item?

Same goes for irelia to a lesser extent.

I know plat elo is trash, but certainly you would think people in plat should know to not build like an autist.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Batchy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=v5YAwwi7,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-02-26T07:53:55.086+0000)
>
>  15 cs at 25 mins?
>
> Same goes for irelia to a lesser extent.

I really hope that's an exaggeration :/

And no, Tri Force is absolutely core on Irelia, it's like you know when you buy a pair of pants that you don't have wear a belt for? It just sits like heaven on your hips and legs? That's what Tri Force is on Irelia. It fits her kit so goddamn perfectly.

> [{quoted}](name=FilAmOzNoob,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=v5YAwwi7,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-26T10:09:55.649+0000)
>
> I really hope that's an exaggeration :/
> 
> And no, Tri Force is absolutely core on Irelia, it's like you know when you buy a pair of pants that you don't have wear a belt for? It just sits like heaven on your hips and legs? That's what Tri Force is on Irelia. It fits her kit so goddamn perfectly.

Yes it is core on Irelia.

No that does not mean you have to get it as your first item. If you die with 1250 g and you decide to buy a sheen and a hp pot, I can guarantee you will die again.
Who the %%%% loses a trade in lane, dies as Irelia and comes back with a Sheen?

I rush Tons o' Damage ( {{item:3078}} ) , {{item:3153}} (Rest is tanky, unless winning by heaps)

Trinity is an absolute rush on Jax.

The {{item:3057}} is great with his W. {{item:3044}} helps him kite  enemies. {{item:3086}} provides atk speed. At speed = More Ult Passive.

No, {{item:3078}} isn't a "luxury"


~~imo~~
oh look years after batchy is still stating the obvious to %%%%s on the forum

> [{quoted}](name=DK SwagNem,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=v5YAwwi7,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-02-26T23:17:25.218+0000)
>
> oh look years after batchy is still stating the obvious to %%%%s on the forum

I  wish it was obvious. Even when I spectate diamond/challenger games noob jax's even do this %%%%.

> [{quoted}](name=DK SwagNem,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=v5YAwwi7,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-02-26T23:17:25.218+0000)
>
> oh look years after batchy is still stating the obvious to %%%%s on the forum

I don't think he has said anything bad about you yet so maybe he's less like that now

No %%%% it's core, but it's not an item that must be rushed. get counter-build, close the gold gap, then get it. If you buy it when you are already behind you will just make the gap larger and they will snowball off you every time.
